tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: "I had a wonderful experience at GC, a very organized, state-of-the art dental clinic. I visited for a tooth decay infection. Dr. Chaitanya's diagnosis is accurate, and he patiently explained the course of treatment. I was apprehensive that the infection & swelling would take long to recede, but with doctor's advice and treatment, I recovered in just 3-4 days. The team of assistant doctors at GC are also skilled and caring, providing detailed explanations of treatments, precautions, and manage follow-up appointments effectively.Thank you.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had a great experience at GC Dental World with Dr.Chaitanya.. He explained my condition very precisely and in detail. He is genuine and passionate towards his work.The other doctors in the clinic were also clear and friendly towards the patients.i would definitely suggest my family and friends to Dr. Chaitanya.

review: Chaitanya Sir is brilliant in his work and does everything with utmost perfection and diligence.I had certain complications in my teeth and tried visiting multiple dentists, yet to no avail. then one of my friends suggested me to visit GC dental world and that was it.after that i never visited other dental hospitals.all my problems had a solution here. I recommend to visit sir if you want a one place solution to all your dental problems.

Well doctor was nice and welcoming, he  nicely explained the problem and also solution to it, I feel he didn't did any other procedures to my other tooth he just recommended for future , also it was nice experience, the things happened very smoothly
All the dentist here are knowledgeable and friendly. They explain the procedure well. Well equipped facility. A bit expensive but worth visiting.
